story_27_02000/2401_1001_0100_10:
The quarterfinals are finally under way. I see
we’re on a new stage, too.
story_27_02000/2401_1001_0200_10: That’s right. And our opponent is...
story_27_02000/2401_1001_0300_10:
So, this day has finally come,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]...
story_27_02000/2401_1001_0400_10:
I could tell there was something special about you
the first time we met.
story_27_02000/2401_1001_0500_10:
I wouldn’t have expected anything less than to see
you here in the quarterfinals.
story_27_02000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Let’s give it our all so we can have the best
battle possible!
story_27_02000/2401_0401_0800_10:
That’s a nice, straightforward response. I’m truly
looking forward to our battle.
story_27_02000/2401_0302_0900_10: I’ll beat you, Cynthia! Just you wait!
story_27_02000/2401_0402_1000_10:
Hehe. That’s some spirit you’ve got there. You’re
getting me all fired up, too.
story_27_02000/2401_1001_1100_10:
U-um, Cynthia, I’ve never seen you in that outfit
or with that Kommo-o behind you.
story_27_02000/2401_1001_1200_10:
Did you change your partner Pokémon this far into
the competition?!
story_27_02000/2401_1001_1300_10: Yes. This is Kommo-o’s first battle here.
story_27_02000/2401_1001_1400_10:
Truth be told, I didn’t actually intend to bring him
out for this battle. I just couldn’t restrain myself
any longer.
story_27_02000/2401_1001_1500_10:
Lady Cynthia says she thinks of herself not as a
Champion but as another challenger here on Pasio.
story_27_02000/2401_1001_1600_10:
It seems she never intended to win here with a
conservative tactic like battling with Garchomp for
every match.
story_27_02000/2401_1001_1700_10:
That having been said, Kommo-o’s strength is on
par with Garchomp’s.
story_27_02000/2401_1001_1900_10:
I believe you. I can sense Kommo-o’s fighting
spirit all the way over here.
story_27_02000/2401_1001_2100_10: we have plenty of fighting spirit ourselves!
story_27_02000/2401_1001_2200_10: Hehe. You all really are outstanding!
story_27_02000/2401_0302_2600_10: We’ll give it all we’ve got!
story_27_02000/2401_1001_2800_10: Then I guess there’s no more need for words!
story_27_02000/2401_1001_3000_10: I’ll give this battle everything I’ve got!
